mapper.select:
with alarm as ( select al.notif_id, al.notif_tp, al.receiver_id as receiver_id, ac.id as sender_id, ac.name as sender_nm, s.shop_nm as shop_nm, al.content as content, al.read_st as read_st, al.send_dt as send_dt from tb_notification as al left outer join tb_account ac on ac.id=al.sender_id left outer join tb_emp e on e.emp_id=al.sender_id left outer join tb_shop s on s.shop_id=e.shop_id )

with alarm as ( select al.notif_id, al.notif_tp, al.receiver_id as receiver_id, ac.id as sender_id, ac.name as sender_nm, s.shop_nm as shop_nm, al.content as content, al.read_st as read_st, DATE_FORMAT(al.send_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as send_dt from tb_notification as al left outer join tb_account ac on ac.id=al.sender_id left outer join tb_emp e on e.emp_id=al.sender_id left outer join tb_shop s on s.shop_id=e.shop_id )
